@wanderlustus - all of these copies of The Hobbit that have flooded TPB the past day or so are MPAA screener copies for the Academy Awards.  They're the copies that are sent to Academy voters to watch to help them decide what movies get nominated for the various categories.

It's not that unusual for screeners to relatively new movies to pop up around this time of year. Sometimes even for movies that have only had awards screenings and won't see wide released until after the Academy Awards broadcast. Shoot, 'This Is 40' had a nice looking screener out two weeks after it was released. At least The Hobbit has already made a nice chunk of change at the box office.
